channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Tariff Folly
item.description: If he keeps them in effect for any significant period of time, Americans will pay a severe price.

item.title: Trump’s Executive Orders Are Only The First Step In Defeating DEI
item.description: Ending mandatory DEI indoctrination in the classroom will require deliberate action by state legislatures and university boards.

item.description: The Department of Justice, FBI, and USAID are posing prominent test cases for how the Trump administration can reform a malignant federal bureaucracy.

item.description: Whether you’re leading a team or climbing your own Everest, focusing on the journey will get you further than obsessing over the destination.

item.description: The UN is tied to shocking scandals harming children and families around the world, and threatens to do much more.

item.title: What Blackstone looks for in a CEO for its companies

item.title: Oklahoma Bill Encourages Marriage With State Tax Credits For Hitched Parents
item.description: If states want to address poverty and children's outcomes, they should encourage raising kids within marriage to the child’s other parent.
